title: Pre-monsoon season road being built in Rohingya camp
text:
Pre-monsoon season road being built in Rohingya camp 10:57am EDT - 01:05 
The road will help prevent over 100,000 refugees from being affected by landslides and floods during Bangladesh's rainy season. Rough cut (no reporter narration)   
The road will help prevent over 100,000 refugees from being affected by landslides and floods during Bangladesh's rainy season. Rough cut (no reporter narration)  //reut.rs/2JpaC7w
